name: Magicafe!
description:
Follow fledgling magical girl Darcy Dragonfruit as she simply tries to get to work!

  • Quick to beat visual novel - Under an hour to play!
  • 8 different endings
  • Fruit based characters
  • Perhaps...romance?
  • A Literal Clown*

This was originally something I made for my VGAA program in school, but I decided after sitting on it for a little while to post it here for folks to check out.  Along with the game I also complied the art I did relating to it which includes character designs for the cast and some of the assets used in the game itself, enjoy!

*Note: She's actually a jester.
